author: joshd4078
content: Quick reminder for those joining weekly standups: We typically do a 5-10 minute breakout room at the beginning of the meeting. I try to keep an eye on the main room for those that are coming in late, but if you do join late and don't get added to a breakout room, just hang out in the main room until we get return. ğŸ™‚
